description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Responsible for development Graphic Communication Service (GCS) of Fuji Xerox in Vietnam
              
              - Responsible for individual sales target and team target.
              
              - Manage a portfolio of customers, communicate and exchange information with customers on a regular basis.
              
              - Professionally present FX’s Corporate Identity, products, services & solutions to the market and prospective customers
              
              - Proactively develop new relationship with prospective customers via sales and relevant activities, including regular direct sales visits, conferences, sales & marketing events, trade fairs… and other possible channels.
              
              - Build a strong positive relationship with existing customers, provide adequate support and service to ensure account’s maximum performance and growth, and prevent threats of competition.
              
              - In charge of every task of assigned sales cycles, including document preparation, customer negotiation, contract, payment, in accordance with company policies & procedures
              
              - Participate in, and promote the sharing of knowledge. Attend training courses as required
              
              - Assist the GCS Sales Manager to ensure all of GCS activities are compliant with company’s policies & procedures.
              
              - Submit all required reports in a complete and timely manner
              
              - Other duties as assigned by GCS Sales Manager
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Working experience in Direct Sales for Industrial, manufacturing field
              
              - Have knowledge or experience in Printing industry is preferred
              
              - Proficient in English both in writing and oral
              
              - Good communication and interpersonal skills, presentation ability and high persuasive competency.
              
              - Target-oriented and capable to work under high pressure
              
              - Proactive, keen to learn and sale oriented
              
              - Team player
              
              - Attention to details
              
              - Capacity to work to the agreed timeframes
              
              - Computer literacy with good MS Office skills
              
              - Occasional domestic travel will be necessary.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
